channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- Magelis HMI Panels
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- Magelis HMI Panels

item.title: CVE-2019-6833|2024-08-04T20:31:04.400Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- magelis%20hmi%20panels
item.description: A CWE-754 â€“ Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability exists in Magelis HMI Panels (all versions of - HMIGTO, HMISTO, XBTGH, HMIGTU, HMIGTUX, HMISCU, HMISTU, XBTGT, XBTGT, HMIGXO, HMIGXU), which could cause a temporary freeze of the HMI when a high rate of frames is received. When the attack stops, the buffered commands are processed by the HMI panel.
